38 #include "rsband_local_planner/car_like_fuzzy_ptc.h"

40 #include <ros/package.h>

46 namespace
47 {
48  double rad2deg(double rad)
49  {
50  return rad * 180.0 / M_PI;
51  }
52 
53  double deg2rad(double deg)
54  {
55  return deg * M_PI / 180.0;
56  }
57 }
58 
59 namespace rsband_local_planner
60 {
61 
62  CarLikeFuzzyPTC::CarLikeFuzzyPTC(std::string name) : initialized_(false)
63  {
64  pnh_ = new ros::NodeHandle("~/" + name);
65  initialize();
66  }
67 
68 
69  CarLikeFuzzyPTC::~CarLikeFuzzyPTC()
70  {
71  delete engine_;
72  // no need to delete fuzzy variables and ruleblock, since it is done in
73  // the destructor of the engine
74  }
75 
76 
77  void CarLikeFuzzyPTC::initialize()
78  {
79  if (initialized_)
80  {
81  ROS_ERROR("Controller already initialized!");
82  return;
83  }
84 
85  pnh_->param("wheelbase", wheelbase_, 0.32);
86  pnh_->param("max_steering_angle", maxSteeringAngle_, 0.35);
87  pnh_->param("max_speed", maxSpeed_, 0.2);
88  pnh_->param("updateSubGoalDistThreshold", updateSubGoalDistThreshold_, 0.4);
89  pnh_->param("xy_goal_tolerance", xyGoalTolerance_, 0.25);
90  pnh_->param("yaw_goal_tolerance", yawGoalTolerance_, 0.1);
91  pnh_->param("lateral_deviation_tolerance", latDevTolerance_, 0.2);
92  pnh_->param<std::string>("rear_steering_mode", rearSteeringMode_, "none");
93  pnh_->param<bool>("display_controller_io", displayControllerIO_, false);
94 
95  // load fuzzy rules
96  if (pnh_->hasParam("fuzzy_rules")) // load from param server if available
97  {
98  if (pnh_->getParam("fuzzy_rules/speed_rules", speedRules_))
99  {
100  ROS_FATAL("Failed to load speed fuzzy rules!");
101  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
102  }
103 
104  if (pnh_->getParam("fuzzy_rules/front_steering_rules",
105  frontSteeringRules_))
106  {
107  ROS_FATAL("Failed to load front steering fuzzy rules!");
108  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
109  }
110 
111  if (pnh_->getParam("fuzzy_rules/rear_steering_deviation_rules",
112  speedRules_))
113  ROS_WARN("Failed to load rear steering deviation fuzzy rules!");
114  }
115  else // load from yaml file in pkg
116  {
117  std::string pkgPath = ros::package::getPath("rsband_local_planner");
118  YAML::Node config = YAML::LoadFile(
119  pkgPath + "/cfg/path_tracking_controller_fuzzy_rules.yaml");
120 
121  speedRules_ =
122  config["fuzzy_rules"]["speed_rules"].as< std::vector<std::string> >();
123  frontSteeringRules_ =
124  config["fuzzy_rules"]["front_steering_rules"].as<
125  std::vector<std::string> >();
126  rearSteeringDeviationRules_ =
127  config["fuzzy_rules"]["rear_steering_deviation_rules"].as<
128  std::vector<std::string> >();
129  }
130 
131  if (!(rearSteeringMode_ == "counter" || rearSteeringMode_ == "crab"
132  || rearSteeringMode_ == "hybrid" || rearSteeringMode_ == "none"))
133  {
134  ROS_FATAL("Invalid rear steering mode selected."
135  "Available modes are {none, counter, crab, hybrid}. Exiting...");
136  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
137  }
138 
139  // initialize sub goal msg and publisher
140  subGoal_.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::SPHERE;
141  subGoal_.scale.x = subGoal_.scale.y = subGoal_.scale.z = 0.1;
142  subGoal_.color.b = 1.0f; subGoal_.color.a = 1;
143  subGoalPub_ = pnh_->advertise<visualization_msgs::Marker>("sub_goal", 1);
144 
145  initialized_ = true;
146 
147  // initialize fuzzy engine
148  initializeFuzzyEngine();
149  }
150 
151 
152  void CarLikeFuzzyPTC::reconfigure(RSBandPlannerConfig& config)
153  {
154  wheelbase_ = config.wheelbase;
155  maxSteeringAngle_ = config.max_steering_angle;
156  maxSpeed_ = config.max_speed;
157  xyGoalTolerance_ = config.xy_goal_tolerance;
158  yawGoalTolerance_ = config.yaw_goal_tolerance;
159  latDevTolerance_ = config.lateral_deviation_tolerance;
160  updateSubGoalDistThreshold_ = config.update_sub_goal_dist_threshold;
161  displayControllerIO_ = config.display_controller_io;
162  stop_ = config.stop;
163 
164  switch(config.rear_steering_mode)
165  {
166  case 0:
167  rearSteeringMode_ = "none";
168  break;
169  case 1:
170  rearSteeringMode_ = "counter";
171  break;
172  case 2:
173  rearSteeringMode_ = "crab";
174  break;
175  case 3:
176  rearSteeringMode_ = "hybrid";
177  break;
178  }
179 
180  // reinitialize fuzzy engine with the updated parameters
181  initializeFuzzyEngine();
182  }
183 
184 
185  void CarLikeFuzzyPTC::initializeFuzzyEngine()
186  {
187  if (!initialized_)
188  {
189  ROS_ERROR("Fuzzy Engine Initialization attempted before controller "
190  "initialization");
191  return;
192  }
193  // initialize FLC engine
194  engine_ = new fl::Engine();
195  engine_->setName("fuzzy_path_tracking_controller");
196 
197  //========================= INPUT VARIABLES ================================
198 
199  // direction input variable
200  direction_ = new fl::InputVariable;
201  direction_->setEnabled(true);
202  direction_->setName("Direction");
203  direction_->setRange(-1.0, 1.0);
204  direction_->addTerm(new fl::Ramp("FW", -0.1, 0.1));
205  direction_->addTerm(new fl::Ramp("BW", 0.1, -0.1));
206  engine_->addInputVariable(direction_);
207 
208  // angle deviation error fuzzy input variable initialization
209  angularDeviationError_ = new fl::InputVariable;
210  angularDeviationError_->setEnabled(true);
211  angularDeviationError_->setName("Ea");
212  angularDeviationError_->setRange(-180.0, 180.0);
213  angularDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("RBR", -180.0, -180.0, -175.0, -165.0));
214  angularDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("RR", -175.0, -165.0, -130.0, -120.0));
215  angularDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("SR", -130.0, -120.0, -40.0, -30.0));
216  angularDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("FR", -40.0, -30.0, -15.0, -5.0));
217  angularDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("FA", -15.0, -5.0, 10.0, 5.0));
218  angularDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("FL", 5.0, 15.0, 30.0, 40.0));
219  angularDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("SL", 30.0, 40.0, 120.0, 130.0));
220  angularDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("RL", 120.0, 130.0, 165.0, 175.0));
221  angularDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("RBL", 165.0, 175.0, 180.0, 180.0));
222  engine_->addInputVariable(angularDeviationError_);
223 
224  // orientation error input variable initialization
225  orientationError_ = new fl::InputVariable;
226  orientationError_->setEnabled(true);
227  orientationError_->setName("Eo");
228  orientationError_->setRange(-180.0, 180.0);
229  orientationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("RBR", -180.0, -180.0, -175.0, -165.0));
230  orientationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("RR", -175.0, -165.0, -130.0, -120.0));
231  orientationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("SR", -130.0, -120.0, -40.0, -30.0));
232  orientationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("FR", -40.0, -30.0, -15.0, -10.0));
233  orientationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("FA", -15.0, -5.0, 5.0, 15.0));
234  orientationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("FL", 5.0, 15.0, 30.0, 40.0));
235  orientationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("SL", 30.0, 40.0, 120.0, 130.0));
236  orientationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("RL", 120.0, 130.0, 165.0, 175.0));
237  orientationError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("RBL", 165.0, 175.0, 180.0, 180.0));
238  engine_->addInputVariable(orientationError_);
239 
240  // position error input variable initialization
241  positionError_ = new fl::InputVariable;
242  positionError_->setEnabled(true);
243  positionError_->setName("Ep");
244  positionError_->setRange(0.0, std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity());
245  positionError_->addTerm(new fl::Trapezoid("CLOSE", 0.0, 0.0, xyGoalTolerance_, 2 * xyGoalTolerance_));
246  positionError_->addTerm(new fl::Ramp("FAR", xyGoalTolerance_, 2 * xyGoalTolerance_));
247  engine_->addInputVariable(positionError_);
248 
249  // lateral deviation error input variable initialization
250  lateralDeviationError_ = new fl::InputVariable;
251  lateralDeviationError_->setEnabled(true);
252  lateralDeviationError_->setName("Ey");
253  lateralDeviationError_->setRange(
254  -std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity(),
255  std::numeric_limits<double>::infinity());
256  lateralDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Ramp("BN", -latDevTolerance_, -3*latDevTolerance_));
257  lateralDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Triangle("SN", -2*latDevTolerance_, 0.0));
258  lateralDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Triangle("Z", -latDevTolerance_, latDevTolerance_));
259  lateralDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Triangle("SP", 0.0, 2*latDevTolerance_));
260  lateralDeviationError_->addTerm(new fl::Ramp("BP", latDevTolerance_, 3*latDevTolerance_));
261  engine_->addInputVariable(lateralDeviationError_);
262 
263  //========================= OUTPUT VARIABLES ===============================
264 
265  // front steering angle output variable initialization
266  frontSteeringAngle_ = new fl::OutputVariable;
267  frontSteeringAngle_->setEnabled(true);
268  frontSteeringAngle_->setName("FSA");
269  frontSteeringAngle_->setRange(-rad2deg(maxSteeringAngle_), rad2deg(maxSteeringAngle_));
270  frontSteeringAngle_->fuzzyOutput()->setAccumulation(fl::null);
271  frontSteeringAngle_->setDefuzzifier(new fl::WeightedAverage("TakagiSugeno"));
272  frontSteeringAngle_->setDefaultValue(0.0);
273  frontSteeringAngle_->setLockPreviousOutputValue(true);
274  frontSteeringAngle_->setLockOutputValueInRange(false);
275  frontSteeringAngle_->addTerm(new fl::Constant("RH", -rad2deg(maxSteeringAngle_)));
276  frontSteeringAngle_->addTerm(new fl::Constant("RL", -rad2deg(maxSteeringAngle_) / 2));
277  frontSteeringAngle_->addTerm(new fl::Constant("Z", 0.0));
278  frontSteeringAngle_->addTerm(new fl::Constant("LL", rad2deg(maxSteeringAngle_) / 2));
279  frontSteeringAngle_->addTerm(new fl::Constant("LH", rad2deg(maxSteeringAngle_)));
280  engine_->addOutputVariable(frontSteeringAngle_);
281 
282  // rear steering angle output variable initialization
283  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_ = new fl::OutputVariable;
284  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->setEnabled(true);
285  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->setName("RSDA");
286  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->setRange(-rad2deg(maxSteeringAngle_), rad2deg(maxSteeringAngle_));
287  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->fuzzyOutput()->setAccumulation(fl::null);
288  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->setDefuzzifier(new fl::WeightedAverage("TakagiSugeno"));
289  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->setDefaultValue(fl::null);
290  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->setLockPreviousOutputValue(true);
291  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->setLockOutputValueInRange(false);
292  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->addTerm(new fl::Constant("RH", -rad2deg(maxSteeringAngle_)));
293  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->addTerm(new fl::Constant("RL", -rad2deg(maxSteeringAngle_) / 2));
294  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->addTerm(new fl::Constant("Z", 0.0));
295  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->addTerm(new fl::Constant("LL", rad2deg(maxSteeringAngle_) / 2));
296  rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->addTerm(new fl::Constant("LH", rad2deg(maxSteeringAngle_)));
297  engine_->addOutputVariable(rearSteeringDeviationAngle_);
298 
299  // speed output variable initialization
300  speed_ = new fl::OutputVariable;
301  speed_->setEnabled(true);
302  speed_->setName("Speed");
303  speed_->setDefaultValue(0.0);
304  speed_->setRange(0.0, maxSpeed_);
305  speed_->fuzzyOutput()->setAccumulation(fl::null);
306  speed_->setDefuzzifier(new fl::WeightedAverage("TakagiSugeno"));
307  speed_->addTerm(new fl::Constant("SLOW", maxSpeed_ / 2));
308  speed_->addTerm(new fl::Constant("FAST", maxSpeed_));
309  engine_->addOutputVariable(speed_);
310 
311 
312  //=============================== RULES ====================================
313 
314  // rule block initialization
315  ruleBlock_ = new fl::RuleBlock;
316 
317  // front steering rules
318  BOOST_FOREACH(std::string rule, frontSteeringRules_)
319  ruleBlock_->addRule(fl::Rule::parse(rule, engine_));
320 
321  // rear steering rules
322  BOOST_FOREACH(std::string rule, rearSteeringDeviationRules_)
323  ruleBlock_->addRule(fl::Rule::parse(rule, engine_));
324 
325  // speed rules
326  BOOST_FOREACH(std::string rule, speedRules_)
327  ruleBlock_->addRule(fl::Rule::parse(rule, engine_));
328 
329  engine_->addRuleBlock(ruleBlock_);
330  engine_->configure(
331  "Minimum", "Maximum", "Minimum", "Maximum", "WeightedAverage");
332 
333  std::string status;
334  if (!engine_->isReady(&status))
335  throw fl::Exception("Engine not ready. "
336  "The following errors were encountered:\n" + status, FL_AT);
337  }
338 
339 
340  bool CarLikeFuzzyPTC::computeVelocityCommands(
341  const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& path,
342  geometry_msgs::Twist& cmd)
343  {
344  if (path.empty())
345  {
346  ROS_ERROR("Plan given to path tracking controller is empty!");
347  return false;
348  }
349 
350  unsigned int subGoalIdx = findSubGoal(path);
351 
352  double ea = calcAngularDeviationError(path, subGoalIdx);
353  double eo = calcOrientationError(path, subGoalIdx);
354  double ep = calcPositionError(path, subGoalIdx);
355  double ey = calcLateralDeviationError(path, subGoalIdx);
356  int drcn = (rad2deg(fabs(ea)) < 120) ? 1 : -1;
357 
358  ROS_INFO_COND(displayControllerIO_, "Ea: %f, Eo: %f, Ep: %f, Ey: %f",
359  rad2deg(ea), rad2deg(eo), ep, ey);
360 
361  if (isGoalReached(path))
362  {
363  cmd = *new geometry_msgs::Twist; // return cleared twist
364  return true;
365  }
366 
367  angularDeviationError_->setInputValue(rad2deg(ea));
368  orientationError_->setInputValue(rad2deg(eo));
369  positionError_->setInputValue(ep);
370  lateralDeviationError_->setInputValue(ey);
371  direction_->setInputValue(drcn);
372 
373  engine_->process();
374 
375  double vel = drcn * speed_->getOutputValue(); // linear velocity
376  double fsa = deg2rad(frontSteeringAngle_->getOutputValue()); // front steering angle
377 
378  double rsa; // rear steering angle
379 
380  if (rearSteeringMode_ == "none")
381  rsa = 0.0;
382  else if (rearSteeringMode_ == "counter")
383  rsa = -fsa;
384  else if (rearSteeringMode_ == "crab")
385  rsa = deg2rad(rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->getOutputValue());
386  else if (rearSteeringMode_ == "hybrid")
387  rsa = -fsa + deg2rad(rearSteeringDeviationAngle_->getOutputValue());
388  else
389  { // it should never come here
390  ROS_FATAL("Invalid Steering Mode. Exiting...");
391  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
392  }
393 
394  double beta = atan((tan(fsa) + tan(rsa)) / 2); // angle between vel.x and vel.y
395 
396  // create command
397  cmd.linear.x = vel * sqrt(1 / (1 + pow(tan(beta), 2)));
398  cmd.linear.y = vel * tan(beta) * sqrt(1 / (1 + pow(tan(beta), 2)));
399  cmd.angular.z = vel * cos(beta) * (tan(fsa) - tan(rsa)) / wheelbase_;
400 
401  ROS_INFO_COND(displayControllerIO_,
402  "vx: %.3f, vy: %.3f, w: %.3f, fsa: %.3f, rsa: %.3f",
403  cmd.linear.x, cmd.linear.y, cmd.angular.z, rad2deg(fsa), rad2deg(rsa));
404 
405  if (isnan(cmd.linear.x) or isnan(cmd.linear.y))
406  {
407  ROS_ERROR("Speed=Nan. Something went wrong!");
408  cmd.linear.x = 0.0;
409  cmd.linear.y = 0.0;
410  return false;
411  }
412  if (isnan(cmd.angular.z))
413  {
414  ROS_ERROR("RotVel=Nan. Something went wrong!");
415  cmd.angular.z = 0.0;
416  return false;
417  }
418 
419  if (stop_)
420  {
421  cmd.linear.x = 0.0;
422  cmd.linear.y = 0.0;
423  cmd.angular.z = 0.0;
424  }
425 
426  return true;
427  }
428 
429 
430  bool CarLikeFuzzyPTC::isGoalReached(
431  const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& path)
432  {
433  bool positionReached =
434  calcPositionError(path, path.size()-1) < xyGoalTolerance_;
435  bool orientationReached =
436  fabs(calcOrientationError(path, path.size()-1)) < yawGoalTolerance_;
437  return positionReached && orientationReached;
438  }
439 
440 
441  double CarLikeFuzzyPTC::calcAngularDeviationError(
442  const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& path,
443  unsigned int subGoalIdx)
444  {
445  return atan2(path[subGoalIdx].pose.position.y,
446  path[subGoalIdx].pose.position.x);
447  }
448 
449 
450  double CarLikeFuzzyPTC::calcOrientationError(
451  const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& path,
452  unsigned int subGoalIdx)
453  {
454  return tf::getYaw(path[subGoalIdx].pose.orientation);
455  }
456 
457 
458  double CarLikeFuzzyPTC::calcPositionError(
459  const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& path,
460  unsigned int subGoalIdx)
461  {
462  return hypot(path[subGoalIdx].pose.position.x, path[subGoalIdx].pose.position.y);
463  }
464 
465 
466  double CarLikeFuzzyPTC::calcLateralDeviationError(
467  const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& path,
468  unsigned int subGoalIdx)
469  {
470  return calcPositionError(path, subGoalIdx)
471  * sin(calcAngularDeviationError(path, subGoalIdx));
472  }
473 
474 
475  double CarLikeFuzzyPTC::calcDistance(
476  const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& path,
477  unsigned int idx1, unsigned int idx2)
478  {
479  double x0, x1, y0, y1;
480  x0 = path[idx1].pose.position.x;
481  y0 = path[idx1].pose.position.y;
482  x1 = path[idx2].pose.position.x;
483  y1 = path[idx2].pose.position.y;
484  return hypot(x1 - x0, y1 - y0);
485  }
486 
487 
488  unsigned int CarLikeFuzzyPTC::findSubGoal(
489  const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& path)
490  {
491  unsigned int subGoalIdx = 0;
492  double distance = 0;
493 
494  while (subGoalIdx < path.size()-1 && distance < updateSubGoalDistThreshold_)
495  {
496  distance += calcDistance(path, subGoalIdx, subGoalIdx+1);
497  subGoalIdx++;
498 
499  if (isCuspPoint(path, subGoalIdx)
500  && calcPositionError(path, subGoalIdx) > xyGoalTolerance_)
501  {
502  break;
503  }
504  }
505 
506  subGoal_.header = path.front().header;
507  subGoal_.pose = path[subGoalIdx].pose;
508  subGoalPub_.publish(subGoal_);
509 
510  return subGoalIdx;
511  }
512 
513 
514  bool CarLikeFuzzyPTC::isCuspPoint(
515  const std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>& path,
516  unsigned int idx)
517  {
518  if (idx < 1 || idx >= path.size() - 2)
519  return false;
520 
521  geometry_msgs::Point a, b;
522  a.x = path[idx].pose.position.x - path[idx-1].pose.position.x;
523  a.y = path[idx].pose.position.y - path[idx-1].pose.position.y;
524  b.x = path[idx].pose.position.x - path[idx+1].pose.position.x;
525  b.y = path[idx].pose.position.y - path[idx+1].pose.position.y;
526 
527  double angle = acos((a.x * b.x + a.y * b.y) / hypot(a.x, a.y)
528  / hypot(b.x, b.y));
529 
530  return !isnan(angle) && (angle < 1.0) && (angle > 0.17);
531  }
532 
533 }
